snippet.description: CAS - CERN Accelerator School: Specialised course on Magnets \- CAS 2009 16 - 25 Jun 2009 \- Hotel Novotel Brugge Centrum, Bruges, Belgium / Brandt, Daniel (ed.) (CERN) These proceedings present the lectures given at the twenty-third specialized course organized by the CERN Accelerator School (CAS), the topic being 'Magnets'. The course was held in Bruges, Belgium, from 16 to 25 June 2009. [...] Geneva : CERN, 2010 - 494 p. arXiv:1105.5069 .- CERN-2010-004 10.5170/CERN-2010-004 Conference home page \- CAS home page \- Table of content (arXiv) \- Fulltext \- CERN library copies
